column4: Hey, the symbols showed up correctly :)
Now go wash your fingers, for I am sure you probably just insulted the non-Asian portion of the channel :P
Yeah, but I currenly have no way of knowing that for sure :P
I'm picking up some verbal Cantonese and Greek. Feck knows if I'll ever learn to read any of either, though :P
While getting through all the Zatoichi movies, I've discovered I've picked up an awful lot of Japanese, actually. Not that I can form a sentence, or anything.
Ehh..just like we do? Is there even an X in the 'alphabet'?
I'd expect them to spell it "linuksu"
Frames?! Are you surfing with a timemachine?
Try links
Get links-ssl, even
ctrl-g for help
meta-A to mark beginning of selection
gpm is the mouse program, I think
It'll always boot on x86 hardware no matter where it was installed, unless something went very wrong
what about graphics?
I said 'boot', not 'launch X' ;)
my bad.
If the kernel and init loads, it has successfully booted. Anything beyond that is pure luxury :P
:P
What would they do with the other 400 megs of space, then?
perhaps more packages?
Yeah..they could almost fit Eclipse 3 on that..
Very briefly: Free for you to use any source, but please credit the creators
